details.info_text: Our wedding will begin at 7pm on May 20th at Ktima Dikaioulia. Here’s everything else you need to know.

photos.intro_text: Our love story began in Athens, back on Saturday 19th of May 2012.
story: I came back from a trip to Norway and that night I was celebrating my birthday with my friends back in Greece.That was the night that the magic happpened.We met and everything else was just meant to be!

Days later, we had our first date and from then we were inseperable.We spent an amazing summer full of cocktails, great food, joy and laughter until I told him that initially I had decided to move to Norway… Alex said that he wanted to come as well! I thought he was joking… but fortunately he wasn’t!
8 memorable years later, on a trip to the north of Norway while chasing the northern lights( aurora ) he popped the question and I said YES!
28.12.2021 - Emily was born and now our little family is complete and filled with love!
20.05.23( 11 year anniversary ) - We are so excited to share our wedding day with you and look forward to dancing the night away with all of our favorite people.

contact.contact_text: We can't wait to celebrate with you. For any questions, or to give us a tip, be in touch!
